contents: GRIB (coded according to the International Alphabet No. 5)
Reserved
Discipline - GRIB Master table number (see Code table 0.0)
GRIB edition number (currently 2)
Total length of GRIB message in octets (including Section 0)
Length of section in octets (21 or nn)
Number of section (1)
Identification of originating/generating centre (see Common Code table C-11)
Identification of originating/generating subcentre (allocated by originating/ generating centre)
GRIB master table version number (see Common Code table C-0 and Note 1)
Version number of GRIB Local tables used to augment Master tables (see Code table 1.1 and Note 2)
Significance of reference time (see Code table 1.2)
Year (4 digits) (Reference time of data)
Month (Reference time of data)
Day (Reference time of data)
Hour (Reference time of data)
Minute (Reference time of data)
Second (Reference time of data)
Production status of processed data in this GRIB message (see Code table 1.3)
Type of processed data in this GRIB message (see Code table 1.4)
Identification template number (optional, see Code table 1.5)
Identification template (optional, see template 1.X, where X is the identification template number given in octets 22-23)
Length of section in octets (nn)
Number of section (2)
Local use
Length of section in octets (nn)
Number of section (3)
Source of grid definition (see Code table 3.0 and Note 1)
Number of data points
Number of octets for optional list of numbers (see Note 2)
Interpretation of list of numbers (see Code table 3.11)
Grid definition template number (= N) (see Code table 3.1)
Grid definition template (see template 3.N, where N is the grid definition template number given in octets 13-14)
Optional list of numbers defining number of points (see Notes 2, 3 and 4)
Length of section in octets (nn)
Number of section (4)
Number of coordinate values after template or number of information according to 3D vertical coordinate GRIB2 message (see Notes 1 and 5)
Product definition template number (see Code table 4.0)
Product definition template (see template 4.X, where X is the product definition template number given in octets 8-9)
Optional list of coordinate values or vertical grid information (see Notes 2, 3, 4 and 5)
Number of vertical levels
Identification number of 3D vertical grid GRIB2 message (defined by originating centre)
UUID part 1 of 4
UUID part 2 of 4
UUID part 3 of 4
UUID part 4 of 4
Length of section in octets (nn)
Number of section (5)
Number of data points where one or more values are specified in Section 7 when a bit map is present, total number of data points when a bit map is absent.
Data representation template number (see Code table 5.0)
Data representation template (see template 5.X, where X is the data representation template number given in octets 10–11)
Length of section in octets (nn)
Number of section (6)
Bit-map indicator (see Code table 6.0 and the Note)

Bit-map - Contiguous bits with a bit to data point correspondence, ordered as defined in Section 3. A bit set to 1 implies the presence of a data value at the corresponding data point, whereas a value of 0 implies the absence of such a value.
Length of section in octets (nn)
Number of section (7)
Data in a format described by data template 7.X, where X is the data representation template number given in octets 10-11 of Section 5.
"7777" (coded according to the International Alphabet No. 5)
